desc: Active: Glimmer - After a 0.4 second delay, grants invisibility and 66% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit. Can be cast while channelling.
attrib:
+ 20 Attack Speed
+ 20% Spell Resistance
GLIMMER FADE TIME: 0.4
GLIMMER MAGIC RESISTANCE: 55%
GLIMMER DURATION: 5
lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.
